briefTitle: Adaptation of a Knowledges Exchange Portal Between (KEP) Healers and Patients : Obstacles and Sources to KEP Use for Breast Cancer Women
officialTitle: Adaptation of a Knowledges Exchange Portal (KEP) Between Healers and Patients : Study of Obstacles and Sources to the Use of a KEP in the Case of Women Affected by a Breast Cancer in Nouvelle Aquitaine(Sav-AQ)
